findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The _approve function is private but lacks access control, allowing unauthorized users to call it.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The _transfer function does not have any access control or validation, allowing anyone to transfer tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function is unprotected and can be exploited by malicious users.

findings.title: Unprotected mint function
findings.description: The smart contract's mint function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized users to mint tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected burn function
findings.description: The burn function does not have any access control, allowing anyone to call it and potentially drain the contract's balance.

findings.title: Unprotected swap function
findings.description: The swap function does not have any access control or validation, allowing anyone to call it and potentially drain the contract's liquidity.

findings.title: Unprotected skim function
findings.description: The skim function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected sync function
findings.description: The 'sync' function is not protected and can be called by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected initialize function
findings.description: The constructor function is unprotected and can be called multiple times, potentially leading to unintended behavior.

findings.title: Unprotected deliver function
findings.description: The deliver function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected excludeFromReward function
findings.description: The excludeFromReward function is unprotected and can be accessed by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected includeInReward function
findings.description: The includeInReward function is unprotected and can be accessed by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized changes to the reward system.

findings.title: Unprotected setTaxFeePercent function
findings.description: The setTaxFeePercent function is unprotected and can be accessed by anyone, allowing them to modify the tax fee percentage.

findings.title: Unprotected setNumTokensSellToAddToLiquidity function
findings.description: The setNumTokensSellToAddToLiquidity function is unprotected and can be accessed by anyone, potentially allowing unauthorized changes to the number of tokens sold to add liquidity.

findings.title: Unprotected setLiquidityFeePercent function
findings.description: The setLiquidityFeePercent function is unprotected and can be called by anyone, potentially allowing an attacker to manipulate the liquidity fee percentage.

findings.title: Unprotected setMarketingAddress function
findings.description: The setMarketingAddress function is unprotected and can be called by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected setTeamAddress function
findings.description: The setTeamAddress function is unprotected and can be accessed by anyone, potentially allowing unauthorized changes to the team address.

findings.title: Unprotected setCharityAddress function
findings.description: The setCharityAddress function is accessible by anyone and lacks access control, allowing unauthorized users to modify the charity address.
